初遇.encontent:
Hello!No no no! Come back here! I won't ... I won't
 crawl out of the screen ...
初遇.content: 你好啊！不不不！别跑！我不会……从电视里爬出来……

箱中气候.content: 呜哇哇，我的信号，闪电要来了！

致未来.encontent:
Well, the future is like a cat in the box! I'd admit
 it is compelling.But I think ... I'm not ready for
 it.
致未来.content:
好吧，未来就像一只装在盒子里的猫！我得承认，它对我
具有极大的吸引力。但我想……我还没做好面对它的准备
。

孑立.encontent:
Err, hello? Someone forgot to turn off the TV! Anyone
 there? Heeellooo!
孑立.content:
喂喂？这里有人忘记关电视了！有人吗？有——人——吗
——？

问候.encontent:
Ohh! Finally made up your mind to share some secrets
 with me? Grab those onion rings and popcorn and come
 closer. Yes ... tell it to my ear.
问候.content:
哦！你终于决定好要和我分享秘密了吗？带上洋葱圈跟爆
米花，凑过来悄悄跟我说……

朝晨.encontent:
Good morning, any interesting gossip ... Oh, you want
 the morning news? Fine, I'm out.
朝晨.content:
早上好，你有没有什么新的小道消……你想要听晨间新闻
？好吧，我这就走。

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Good morning! Ah, you are having Sprinkle Spangles! Shame that
 I can't have any ... Or shall we run a simulation? Come, I will
 open my mouth, and you will take a spoonful in front of the
 screen and act like you're going to feed me, aaaaah ...
信任-朝晨.content:
早上好！你的玉米片看上去好吃极了，真可惜我尝不到它
……但我们可以模拟我尝到它的过程。来，接下来我会张
开嘴，而你用勺子舀起他们放在屏幕前，啊——

夜暮.encontent:
Hey, you, you you you ...  really gonna spend a nice
 evening on these boring stories of hell? Hell no,
 I'd better get the hell out of here!
夜暮.content:
嘿，你们，你们你们你们……当真要把夜晚的美好时光浪
费在无聊的鬼故事上？见鬼，我最好赶紧离开这个鬼地方
！

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Come over here! Put this TV down on the ground! Ooh!
 I haven't lay down in ages, I almost forgot how comfortable
 this can be.
信任-夜暮.content:
过来过来！把这个电视机放倒试试！噢！我好久没有躺下
了，这滋味真让人怀念～

帽檐与发鬓.encontent: Hey! Stop smacking! The signal is alright!

袖与手.encontent:
These are not my hands. But if you want to feel them
 ... you can try touching the electric current ...
袖与手.content:
我的手可不在这。不过如果你想碰的话……可以试试触摸
电流……

衣着与身形.encontent: What to watch now—The Fitness Girl.
衣着与身形.content: 现在为您播放节目——《健美女郎》。

嗜好.encontent:
The bottom of the drawer, the confessional, a locked
 cabinet ... Diaries, reminder booklets, and notes
 hidden in the jacket's pocket ...
嗜好.content:
抽屉底、忏悔室、上了锁的柜子～日记本、备忘录、衬衣
里侧的留言～

赞赏.encontent:
Hey! Can I have your autograph? Like those celebrities
 on TV!
赞赏.content: 嘿！给我签个名儿吧，就像那些电视里的明星一样！

亲昵.encontent:
It's great that you don't have to pay for electricity here. Just
 imagine what the bill would have looked like! But even if you
 had to pay, you will leave the TV on for me, because I'm worth
 it, right?
亲昵.content:
你这儿不需要付电费真是太好了，不然，我可不敢想象你
总这样开着电视要多付多少钱！不过即使那样，你也会开
着电视的，因为我值得，是不是？

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
This place is not as interesting as you thought it
 would be. People have locked away many things ...
  Locks ... over locks.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
这里面没你想的那么有趣，人们在很多地方都上了锁……一
重，又一重。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
What ... is ... going ... wrong? Turn it ... off and
 ... on again, or unplug the TV!Don't you ... know
 ... a restart solves ... everything!
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
出……了……什么……问题？关上……再打开……实在不
行，就把电源都拔掉！重启……你听过吗？重启！万……能
维修公式！

独白.encontent:
It's not about the size or depth of a secret,even the least important
 thing can be intriguing once it's intentionally covered up.
 Just like the candy jar on top of the wardrobe. It always has
 my curiosity.
独白.content:
不在大小，不在深浅，只要有人试图掩盖，什么样的小事
都会变得充满吸引力。就像是柜子顶上的糖罐儿，我总得
想办法尝尝它的滋味。

入队.encontent: What, what? Make space for me!
入队.content: 什么什么？给我也腾个位子！

战前.encontent: Let me hear it, let me hear it!
战前.content: 让我听听，让我好好听听！

择选高阶咒语.encontent: I never expected this from you!

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: Oh? Mhmm, mhmm! Ohh ... This is breath-taking!
召唤至终的仪式.content: 哦？嗯哼，嗯哼！哦——这可真是太惊人了！

战斗胜利.encontent: The TV always prevails! This is the power of amusement!
战斗胜利.content: 谁都会向“电视机”屈服，这可是娱乐的诱惑！

洞悉.content: 感谢你为“秘密界”做出的贡献～
